title: Fishing Barents Sea MULTi17-PLAZA
description:
P-R-E-S-E-N-T-S

Fishing: Barents Sea MULTi17 (c) astragon Entertainment GmbH
Release Date: 03/2018 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Simulation
Take the helm of your very own fishing boat inFishing: Barents
Seaand explore the vastness of the Norwegian sea in search for the
best fishing zones. Start with the little boat inherited from your
grandfather, catch fish and earn money for upgrades as well as
bigger and better boats. Enjoy the beautiful Barents Sea and make
your fishing industry dreams come true

For more info go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/501080/

1. Mount ISO
2. Install the game
3. Copy crack from the PLAZA folder
4. Play!

NOTES: The game is updated to v1.0.15 and includes the following
languages:

>English
>French
>German
>Spanish
>Czech
>Japanese
>Norwegian
>Polish
>Russian
>Italian
>Danish
>Finnish
>Portuguese-Brazil
>Simplified Chinese
>Swedish
>Traditional Chinese
>Turkish

* Use the included language.changer.exe to switch to desired language

General Notes:

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online
If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead
